divs: sighting detailsi have observed numerous ufo's from my house in the san fernando valley. i therefore sometimes study the skys, knowing just how frequent these objects have appeared. on this particular day, i happened to notice a dot of light barely indistinguishable against the blue sky, traveling straight up at what appeared to be a slow rate, yet traveling a great distance just the same. i waited for the object to rise up in front of the moon (visible in daylight, at this time) so that i could better see what i was looking at: the object was, indeed, a sphere. it traveled across the sky in a very peculiar way -- seeming to just float and glide sometimes with seemingly no defined path. i ran inside the house to alert my brother, as he has observed these objects as well, and gave him my digital camera to record the object. please note that these same objects have been so difficult to track with the naked eye in the past because of how high up they are. however, because they are visible at all, especially against the moon, i would have to imagine that the objects themselves are quite sizeable (maybe 1\3 of a standard prop-plane or cessna). therefore, the object in the attached video -- while clearly visible -- was ultimately only recorded for a brief amount of time, as it could not be seen on either the camera's screen, nor with the naked eye after such a point. the object only appears so well-defined in the video because of the maximum-zoom feature on the camera. the object seemed to be flashing red, but i do not believe this was from the reflection of the sun. the flashing seemed to occur rhythmically, on a timed beat. i have observed also a black sphere and white sphere next to one another in the same area, approximately two years ago, but which were not recorded. these spheres seem to appear in clear skies and travel towards cloud formations, or, perhaps more appropriately, chemtrail dispersions. the implications are quite clear: i do not believe that these are extra-terrestrial in origin, but rather deployed by the military to test the air quality at high altitudes. the main implication, of course, being that the government is acutally employing technology in broad daylight that uses no discernable propulsion system and must therefore be some anti-gravity object\craft. you may contact me by my e-mail if desired.
